title: [Discussion] when will the college start for 1st year btech students in electronic city
content: when will the college start for 1st year btech students in electronic city

comments.body: My friend was saying it will start Aug 4th
last time i asked the helpline a few days ago, they said august, they werent sure which week of august itself
Nope, It's 2nd or 3rd week for sure
